front.title: Ethernet in the First Mile Copper (EFMCu) Interfaces MIB

abstract.t: This document defines a Management Information Base (MIB) module for use with network management protocols in TCP/IP based internets. This document proposes an extension to the Ethernet-like Interfaces MIB and MAU MIB modules with a set of objects for managing an Ethernet in the First Mile Copper (EFMCu) interfaces 10PASS-TS and 2BASE-TL, defined in IEEE Std 802.3ah-2004.
